//pasta Salmon 
1 tablespoon garlic powder 
1 tablespoon dried basil 
½ teaspoon salt 
4 (6 ounce) fillets salmon 
2 tablespoons butter 
4 lemon wedges Gather all ingredients 
Stir garlic powder, basil, and salt together in a small bowl. 
Rub the mixture evenly over salmon. 
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add salmon and cook until browned and flaky, about 5 minutes per side. 
Serve salmon with lemon wedges. 
Salmon is ready! //maggi Porridge 
350ml milk 
Greek yogurt put 50g porridge oats into a saucepan 
pour 350ml of milk an sprinkle a pinch of salt 
bring to a boil and simmer for 4-5 minutes 
stirring from time to time to make sure the porridge does not stick 
porridge is ready! //pea soup Frozen peas 
Red onion 
Garlic 
Fresh Ginger 
Olive Oil 
Vegetable Stock roughly chop the onion and ginger and crush the garlic. 
combine the olive oil, garlic, onion, and ginger and fry until the onion softens. 
Add the frozen peas and vegetable stock and boil for 5 minutes. 
Hand or machine blend until smooth. 
Pea Soup is ready! //beetroot salad Beetroot 
Feta cheese 
Rocket leaves 
Olive oil 
Balsamic vinegar 
Salt and pepper Slice the beetroot into thin pieces. 
Combine beetroot slices, feta cheese, and rocket leaves in a bowl. 
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad. 
Season with salt and pepper. 
Beetroot Salad is ready! //rice Rice 
Water 
Salt Rinse 1 cup of rice under cold water until water runs clear. 
Combine rice with 2 cups of water and a pinch of salt in a pot. 
Bring to a boil, then lower heat and cover. 
Cook for 18-20 minutes, then fluff with a fork. 
Rice is ready! //chicken Chicken breasts 
Olive oil 
Salt 
Pepper 
Garlic powder 
Paprika Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
Rub chicken breasts with olive oil, then season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika. 
Place chicken in a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes or until fully cooked. 
Chicken is ready!
//beef Ground beef 
Onion 
Garlic 
Tomato sauce 
Salt 
Pepper Heat a skillet over medium heat and add ground beef. 
Cook until browned, then add chopped onion and minced garlic. 
Stir in tomato sauce and season with salt and pepper. 
Simmer for 10 minutes. 
Beef is ready! MapsActivity
